title: Verify landing page loads with featured sections
description: Check that the landing page loads successfully and displays all featured sections including hero, featured products, testimonials, categories, and Instagram feed.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page URL
Verify hero section is visible with appropriate content
Verify featured products section displays correct products
Verify testimonials section displays customer testimonials
Verify categories section lists all jewelry categories
Verify Instagram feed section loads images dynamically

title: Product browsing with category filtering and search
description: Validate that users can browse products by categories, apply filters, and use the smart search function to find products.

steps.description: Navigate to a product collections page
Select a category filter from the filter sidebar
Verify only products from the selected category are displayed
Enter a search term in the smart search input
Verify search results dynamically update to match the search term
Clear filters and search
Verify full product grid is restored

title: Display product details and related products
description: Ensure that product detail pages load correct product information, images, specifications, and show relevant related products.

steps.description: Navigate to a specific product detail page
Verify multiple product images load correctly and can be previewed
Verify product specifications and certifications are correctly displayed
Verify related products section shows relevant products

title: Add and remove items from shopping cart with real-time updates
description: Validate that adding and removing products from the shopping cart updates the cart instantly, and that the cart sidebar displays current state.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page and add item to cart
Verify cart sidebar updates immediately with the new item and quantity
Increase item quantity using cart controls
Verify cart totals and item quantity update instantly
Remove item from cart
Verify the item is removed and cart updates immediately

title: Wishlist functionality with persistence
description: Check that users can add and remove items from the wishlist and that wishlist state persists across sessions using local storage.

steps.description: Add a product to wishlist from product grid or detail page
Verify product appears in wishlist page and icon state updates everywhere
Remove product from wishlist
Verify product is removed from wishlist page and icon state updates
Reload the browser or revisit the site
Verify wishlist state remains consistent with previous session

title: Checkout process with validation and payment options
description: Verify the checkout flow requires valid contact and shipping information, supports multiple payment methods, and completes the order successfully.

steps.description: Add products to cart and proceed to checkout page
Fill in contact and shipping information with valid data
Verify form validation passes with valid inputs
Attempt to submit checkout with invalid or missing data
Verify validation errors are shown with clear messages
Select each available payment method and confirm payment process
Verify order confirmation page is displayed after successful payment

title: Admin authentication with JWT, password hashing, and rate limiting
description: Ensure admin login enforces SHA-256 password hashing, JWT token issuance with session expiration, and rate limiting on repeated failed login attempts.

steps.description: Attempt to login with correct admin credentials
Verify successful login and JWT token is issued with proper expiry
Logout and attempt login with invalid password multiple times consecutively
Verify login attempts are rate limited after threshold is exceeded
Verify password in transit and storage is SHA-256 hashed

title: Admin console product CRUD operations
description: Validate that admin users can create, read, update, and delete products with proper data validation and image uploads.

steps.description: Log in to admin console and navigate to products management
Create a new product with all required details and upload images
Verify product is listed with correct information and images
Update existing product details and images
Verify updates are saved and reflected correctly
Delete a product from the list
Verify product is removed from the product list
Attempt product creation with invalid or incomplete data
Verify validation errors prevent product creation

title: SEO utilities generate correct metadata, sitemap, and robots.txt
description: Check that SEO features produce accurate meta tags on pages, and that sitemap.xml and robots.txt files are correctly generated and accessible.

steps.description: Load a product detail page and inspect meta tags
Verify metadata includes correct title, description, and relevant structured data
Request sitemap.xml endpoint
Verify sitemap XML contains URLs for all relevant pages
Request robots.txt endpoint
Verify robots.txt contains appropriate rules for search engines

title: Responsive design across devices and screen sizes
description: Verify that the entire platform UI renders and functions correctly on multiple screen sizes including mobile, tablet, desktop, and large screens using the luxury color palette and typography.

steps.description: Access the storefront on a mobile phone viewport
Verify layout adjusts properly with accessible navigation and readable fonts
Access on a tablet viewport
Verify UI elements scale appropriately with no overlap or truncation
Access on desktop and large desktop viewports
Verify full site features visible and styling follows brand palette and typography

title: Error boundaries capture and display component errors
description: Test that UI error boundary components correctly catch runtime errors in child components and display fallback UI to users.

steps.description: Induce an error inside a child React component (e.g. throw in componentDidMount)
Verify error boundary catches the error and shows fallback UI instead of crashing the entire app
Verify error details are logged or reported as per implementation

title: User forms validate input with clear error messages
description: Check that login, checkout, and other user input forms properly validate data using zod schemas and react-hook-form, presenting clear and accessible error messages.

steps.description: Open login or checkout form
Submit empty or invalid inputs
Verify error messages appear next to invalid fields describing the required fix
Fill inputs with valid data and submit
Verify no validation errors and form submits successfully

title: Cart and wishlist state persistence with local storage and Zustand store
description: Ensure that cart and wishlist states are synchronized between Zustand global store and browser local storage and persist across user reloads.

steps.description: Add items to cart and wishlist
Reload the page or close and reopen the browser
Verify cart and wishlist contents are restored correctly from local storage
Modify cart and wishlist and simultaneously inspect Zustand store state
Verify local storage and Zustand store states remain in sync

title: Modern UX enhancements function as expected
description: Validate that UX enhancements such as lazy loading images, smooth scrolling, back-to-top button, live chat popup, newsletter popup, and loading skeletons activate and function correctly.

steps.description: Scroll through product lists and verify that images are lazy loaded progressively
Confirm smooth scroll behavior when using navigation links
Scroll down the page and click back-to-top button
Verify page scrolls smoothly back to top
Trigger live chat popup by user interaction or timer
Verify live chat UI displays and can send/receive messages
Observe newsletter popup on page load or scroll
Verify popup appears and can close or submit newsletter form
Navigate various pages and observe loading skeletons
Ensure loading states display skeleton components correctly

title: Critical user flows covered by unit, integration, and E2E tests
description: Confirm that code coverage meets specified thresholds by running unit, integration, and end-to-end tests across critical paths like login, product browsing, cart, and checkout.

steps.description: Run all unit tests and verify coverage report
Verify unit test coverage meets or exceeds defined threshold (e.g., 80%)
Run integration tests covering components interaction (e.g., product filtering and cart state)
Verify integration tests pass and coverage threshold met
Run end-to-end (E2E) tests simulating critical user flows
Verify E2E tests pass reliably covering login, purchase, admin tasks
